projects.title: OrbiGoal
projects.description: A football analytics app built to provide in-depth match analysis and predictions using React Native and Firebase. It integrates machine learning with user-friendly interfaces to make data-driven insights accessible to football enthusiasts.

projects.title: Lounge Booking Bot
projects.description: A Telegram bot that streamlines the lounge booking process for students. Developed using Python and SQL, it provides an intuitive interface for reserving campus lounges, automating and simplifying booking logistics.

projects.title: 2D Fighting Game
projects.description: A 2D fighting game featuring custom-made characters and animations, developed from scratch using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Players can experience unique combat mechanics and an offline leaderboard system for competitive fun.
